document.full_text: european stocks fell on wednesday and the dollar dropped to a one-month low against the yen after u.s. federal reserve chairman ben bernanke offered a grim view of the economy but failed to offer hints of fresh stimulus.
document.title: global stocks slide, dollar dented by bernanke
lines_and_colors: european stocks fell on wednesday and the dollar dropped to a one-month low against the yen after u.s. federal reserve chairman ben bernanke offered a grim view of the economy but failed to offer hints of fresh stimulus.
